scripts.start:app: docker build -t app -f app/Dockerfile app && echo 'Docker image for app successfully built'
scripts.start:auth: docker build -t auth -f auth/Dockerfile auth && echo 'Docker image for auth successfully built'
scripts.start:converter: docker build -t converter -f converter/Dockerfile converter && echo 'Docker image for converter successfully built'
scripts.start:dashboard: docker build -t dashboard -f dashboard/Dockerfile dashboard && echo 'Docker image for dashboard successfully built'
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:app" "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:converter" "npm run start:dashboard"
